Return Policy

  • If you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, Petmate.com offers returns for most items within 30 days of the original date of purchase. Before sending your return please email our Consumer Service Team at consumerservices@petmate.com.

    • After 30 days from the original date of purchase, all sales are final.

    • If you paid for shipping on your original order we will refund that shipping charge to you 

    • Return shipping charges are paid by the customer unless it was due to a shipping error on our part.

    • Returns must be shipped freight prepaid. Any return sent back freight collect will be refused.

    • All returns must be in unused condition and in original factory packaging with all original packing materials. Please include a copy of the original packing list or the Petmate order number.

    • In the unlikely event that your product is missing parts, please email us at consumerservices@petmate.com within 30 days of the original date of purchase and we will send you the missing parts at no charge.

    • Shipping charges for motor freight LTL deliveries that have been refused will not be refunded.  A restocking fee may also be charged.

  • Damaged items

    • If a package arrives damaged, it’s best for you to refuse the package. If you sign for and keep the package, you should note the damage when signing for it so that a claim may be filed with the carrier.

    • Damaged products are allowed for replacement or credit within 30 days of the original date of purchase.

  • Defective items

    • Defective products are allowed for replacement or credit within 30 days of the original date of purchase, or during the product warranty period.

    • Please contact us at consumerservices@petmate.com before shipping the defective item back to Petmate.

  • Exchanged items

    • An exchange will be handled as a purchase/return. You should make a new purchase of the correct item and return the original item back to Petmate in unused condition.

  • Incorrect item

    • If the wrong item is shipped to you, please contact Petmate Consumer Services at consumerservices@petmate.com for further instructions.

  • Order cancellation

    • If you wish to cancel your please contact Petmate Consumer Services Team us at consumerservices@petmate.com

    • Orders can only be canceled if they have not yet been processed by our distribution center. 

    • Orders are sent to our distribution center within 30 minutes of your order being placed.

  • Credits

    • All credits will be made back to the original payment method. Petmate will request a credit to your account within 14 business days from the date that we receive and audit the return. If the item is not returned, then credit will not be issued.

    • Please note that credit card companies vary in the time it takes to post credits to your account and we cannot control when you will receive your credit.

  • All product returns should be sent directly to:

    Petmate
    3201 N. Houston School Road
    Lancaster, TX 75134
    ATTN: Consumer Returns
